history.proof: intros x y m. qauto use: @sat_impp, @sat_mono.

ctx: assert (H1: KRIPKE: M, m |= x --> y).
assert (H2: forall n : Kworlds M, m <= n -> KRIPKE: M, n |= x).
exceptions.exn: No such bound variable m (possible names are: m0, n and x0).

original: intros x y m. unfold satisfies, denote_impp, Same_set in kiSM. unfold upwards_closed_Kdenote in kminSM. assert (H1: KRIPKE: M, m |= x --> y). { apply sat_impp. } assert (H2: forall n : Kworlds M, m <= n -> KRIPKE: M, n |= x). { apply sat_mono with (m:=m); auto. } apply H1 in H2. apply H2.
